DOC.HEADLINE: EARNINGS
DOC.TEXT: Texaco Inc. ' s earnings fell 27 % on lower crude_oil prices . Texaco earned $ 202 million , or 69 cents per share , on revenue of $ 7.43 billion in the first three months of the year . A year ago , the company earned $ 278 million , or 97 cents per share , on revenue of $ 8.23 billion . The White Plains , N.Y.-based firm ' s exploration and production earnings fell 43 % to $ 120 million . The refining and marketing profit rose 18.7 % to $ 203 million .
